item.content:encoded: What to expect from FF14‚Äôs 7.0 Dawntrail add-on At Final Fantasy 14 FanFest 2023 on Friday, Square Enix and producer Naoki Yoshida unveiled the 7.0 Dawntrail expansion and revealed what will arrive alongside this major content update coming in summer 2024. Major changes will appear alongside this content update, including the highly anticipated graphical upgrade, an overhaul t...

item.title: Here are the last free Xbox Live Games with Gold | Polygon - Gaming
item.description: Image: IO Interactive/Square Enix This used to be my playground... After a decade of doling out free video games to Xbox Live Gold subscribers, now we come to the end. Xbox Live Games with Gold clos...
item.content:encoded: Image: IO Interactive/Square Enix This used to be my playground... After a decade of doling out free video games to Xbox Live Gold subscribers, now we come to the end. Xbox Live Games with Gold closes up shop in September. Henceforth it will be known as Xbox Game Pass Core, which still gives subscribers multiplayer access (and a library of titles) but it ends Microsoft‚Äôs 10-year campaign of searching out, dredging up, and strong-arming games publishers into handing over a title or two each mon...

item.content:encoded: Photo composition: Alice Newcome-Beill/Polygon | Source images: Beamdog [superimposing box art onto a key art background] The bundle is available through Aug. 16 The ‚ÄúBaldur‚Äôs Gate & Beyond‚Äù bundle at Humble brings together eight classic games from the Dungeons & Dragons universe for just $12, making this the perfect opportunity to gear up ahead of the launch of Baldur‚Äôs Gate 3. item.content:encoded: Image: NetherRealm Studios/Warner Bros. Games NetherRealm‚Äôs next fighting game will be playable a month early for some Mortal Kombat 1 is coming to Nintendo Switch, PlayStation 5, Windows PC, and Xbox Series X on Sept. 19, but some MK fans will be able to play it a month early, thanks to a four-day beta test coming this August. The Mortal Kombat 1 beta will begin on Friday, Aug. 18, at 11 a.m. EDT/8 a.m. PDT, and run through Monday, Aug. 21, at 11 a.m. EDT/8 a.m. PDT, according to the official...

item.content:encoded: Photo: Henry Hargreaves for Polygon Console cost drop might signal new SKU Sony is temporarily lowering the price of the PlayStation 5 in the U.K., Ireland, Germany, Austria, and India, a discount that appears to signal a similar temporary price drop in the U.S. In the U.K. and Ireland, Sony is knocking ¬£75 off the price of the PS5, bringing it down to ¬£404.99 through Aug. 10; in Germany and Austria, Sony is offering a ‚Ç¨75 discount, bringing the price down to ‚Ç¨474.99 until Aug. 7. Those deals ...

item.content:encoded: Image: Sunblink/Apple Arcade Time to start exploring After seeing Greta Gerwig‚Äôs Barbie movie and playing Hello Kitty Island Adventure last weekend, I have to wonder: Is it cool to be a girl again? But actually. We‚Äôve gotten glittering pop tracks featuring Power Puff Girl-inspired visuals from NewJeans and Gerwig‚Äôs movie has been released to theaters to seemingly universal fanfare and pink. Now, fans of mobile games get a little cherry on top: a social sim featuring Sanrio‚Äôs cast of characters...

item.content:encoded: Eight Squishmallows stuffed into two vacuum seal bags | Photo: Nicole Carpenter It‚Äôs a moving experience Even before I started packing for my upcoming move, the thought of packing my Pok√©mon Squishmallow collection haunted me. I was already feeling some resentment due to the sheer amount of space they take up. (It‚Äôs mostly the 20-inch ones that are simply too big.) item.content:encoded: Image: Sony Here‚Äôs where to reserve the spidey gear ahead of their Sept. 1 launch Pre-orders for the hot, new Spider-Man 2 special edition PS5 console and themed accessories are currently live through Sony. While Marvel‚Äôs Spider-Man 2 for the PlayStation 5 doesn‚Äôt launch until Oct. 20, the console and the rest of the goodies are set to launch on Sept. 1. item.title: RT-2: New model translates vision and language into action | DeepMind Blog
item.description: Introducing Robotic Transformer 2 (RT-2), a novel vision-language-action (VLA) model that learns from both web and robotics data, and translates this knowledge into generalised instructions for roboti...
item.content:encoded: Introducing Robotic Transformer 2 (RT-2), a novel vision-language-action (VLA) model that learns from both web and robotics data, and translates this knowledge into generalised instructions for robotic control, while retaining web-scale capabilities. This work builds upon Robotic Transformer 1 (RT-1), a model trained on multi-task demonstrations which can learn combinations of tasks and objects seen in the robotic data. RT-2 shows improved generalisation capabilities and semantic and visual unde...

item.content:encoded: Image: Activision ‚ÄòThe Harajuku Barbie‚Äô will be an Operator in season 5 Nicki Minaj is coming to Call of Duty: Warzone and Modern Warfare 2 as an Operator ‚Äî the franchise‚Äôs first ‚Äúself-named female Operator,‚Äù publisher Activision revealed Thursday. While numerous real-life celebrities have appeared in Call of Duty games over the years, including Snoop Dogg, Lionel Messi, and Kevin Durant, the only women to appear as Operators have been fictional. Until Nicki. Minaj will be featured in Warzone ...

item.title: How dynamic lookahead improves speech recognition | Amazon Science homepage
item.description: Determining on the fly how much additional audio to process to resolve ambiguities increases accuracy while reducing latency relative to fixed-lookahead approaches.
item.content:encoded: Determining on the fly how much additional audio to process to resolve ambiguities increases accuracy while reducing latency relative to fixed-lookahead approaches.

In search of a generalizable method for source-free domain adaptation | Google AI Blog
item.description: Posted by Eleni Triantafillou, Research Scientist, and Malik Boudiaf, Student Researcher, Google Deep learning has recently made tremendous progress in a wide range of problems and applications, but m...
item.content:encoded: Posted by Eleni Triantafillou, Research Scientist, and Malik Boudiaf, Student Researcher, Google Deep learning has recently made tremendous progress in a wide range of problems and applications, but models often fail unpredictably when deployed in unseen domains or distributions. Source-free domain adaptation (SFDA) is an area of research that aims to design methods for adapting a pre-trained model (trained on a ‚Äúsource domain‚Äù) to a new ‚Äútarget domain‚Äù, using only unlabeled data from the latter...

item.description: Posted by Cat Armato, Program Manager, Google Groups across Google actively pursue research in the field of machine learning (ML), ranging from theory and application. We build ML systems to solve...
item.content:encoded: Posted by Cat Armato, Program Manager, Google Groups across Google actively pursue research in the field of machine learning (ML), ranging from theory and application. We build ML systems to solve deep scientific and engineering challenges in areas of language, music, visual processing, algorithm development, and more. We aim to build a more collaborative ecosystem with the broader ML research community through open-sourcing tools and datasets, publishing our work, and actively participating...

item.description: AI is a powerful technology that will transform our future, so how can we best apply it to help combat climate change and find sustainable solutions? The effects of climate change on Earth‚Äôs ecosystem...
item.content:encoded: AI is a powerful technology that will transform our future, so how can we best apply it to help combat climate change and find sustainable solutions? The effects of climate change on Earth‚Äôs ecosystems are incredibly complex, and as part of our effort to use AI for solving some of the world‚Äôs most challenging problems, here are some of the ways we‚Äôre working to advance our understanding, optimise existing systems, and accelerate breakthrough science of climate and its effects.

item.content:encoded: At this year‚Äôs ACL, Amazon researchers won an outstanding-paper award for showing that knowledge distillation using contrastive decoding in the teacher model and counterfactual reasoning in the student model improves the consistency of ‚Äúchain of thought‚Äù reasoning.

Because societal contexts by nature are dynamic, complex, non-linear, contested, subjective, and highly qualitative, they are challenging to translate i...

item.content:encoded: This article explores the technical details and implications of Meta's newly released Llama 2, a large language model that promises to revolutionize the field of generative AI. We delve into its capabilities, performance, and potential applications, while also discussing its open-source nature and the company's commitment to safety and transparency.

item.content:encoded: Posted by Daniel McDuff, Staff Research Scientist, and Yuzhe Yang, Student Researcher, Google Learning from periodic data (signals that repeat, such as a heart beat or the daily temperature changes on Earth‚Äôs surface) is crucial for many real-world applications, from monitoring weather systems to detecting vital signs. For example, in the environmental remote sensing domain, periodic learning is often needed to enable nowcasting of environmental changes, such as precipitation patterns or la...

item.description: Data Storytelling with Python Altair and Generative AI teaches you how to turn raw data into effective, insightful data stories. You‚Äôll learn exactly what goes into an effective data story, then combi...
item.content:encoded: Data Storytelling with Python Altair and Generative AI teaches you how to turn raw data into effective, insightful data stories. You‚Äôll learn exactly what goes into an effective data story, then combine your Python data skills with the Altair library and AI tools to rapidly create amazing visualizations.

item.description: The second edition of the book Neural Networks and Deep Learning is now available. This book covers both classical and modern models in deep learning. The book is intended to be a textbook for univers...
item.content:encoded: The second edition of the book Neural Networks and Deep Learning is now available. This book covers both classical and modern models in deep learning. The book is intended to be a textbook for universities, and it covers the theoretical and algorithmic aspects of deep learning. The second edition is significantly expanded and covers many modern topics such as graph neural networks, adversarial learning, attention mechanisms, transformers, and large language models.

item.title: Automating the Chain of Thought: How AI Can Prompt Itself to Reason | KDnuggets
item.description: Auto-CoT prompting method has LLMs automatically generate their own demonstrations to prompt complex reasoning, using diversity-based sampling and zero-shot generation, reducing human effort in creati...
item.content:encoded: Auto-CoT prompting method has LLMs automatically generate their own demonstrations to prompt complex reasoning, using diversity-based sampling and zero-shot generation, reducing human effort in creating prompts. Experiments show it matches performance of manual prompting across reasoning tasks.

item.description: We‚Äôve published our joint paper with Google Research in Nature Medicine, which proposes CoDoC (Complementarity-driven Deferral-to-Clinical Workflow), an AI system that learns when to rely on predictiv...
item.content:encoded: We‚Äôve published our joint paper with Google Research in Nature Medicine, which proposes CoDoC (Complementarity-driven Deferral-to-Clinical Workflow), an AI system that learns when to rely on predictive AI tools or defer to a clinician for the most accurate interpretation of medical images.
